Discover Maui - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Discover Maui Visit a place with the perfect mix of natural wonders, where golden sands and crystal-clear waters entice beach-goers, while Maui’s green valleys and volcanic landscapes enthral nature lovers. Sample local flavours in charming small towns, visit artist communities and shop at boutique stores or spend your time relaxing on the beach. Maui is a special place to discover. Deal Details Travel Dates 16 Feb 2026 - 31 May 2026 Sale Ends Nov 14, 2025 Priced From $1,949 Enquire Now Visit a place with the perfect mix of natural wonders, where golden sands and crystal-clear waters entice beach-goers, while Maui’s green valleys and volcanic landscapes enthral nature lovers. Sample local flavours in charming small towns, visit artist communities and shop at boutique stores or spend your time relaxing on the beach. Maui is a special place to discover. Accommodation Hyatt Regency Maui Resort & Spa + Pacific Whale Foundation Watch - Maalaea Harbor (5 stars) Make yourself at home at this stunning oceanfront resort, ideally located on the peaceful Kaanapali Beach. Spread out in the spacious rooms and suites and enjoy the relaxing lagoon pool. Sample the onsite island style dining and bask in the resorts superior comfort and quality. Pacific Whale Foundation Watch - Maalaea Harbor - Experience the thrill of a lifetime searching for the gentle Pacific Humpback Whale aboard the Ocean Voyager or Ocean Odyssey. Guests can enjoy panoramic views from the deck and be immersed in educational activities about marine conservation efforts. Rooms King Room (5 nights) 16 Feb - 30 Apr 26 Stay price: $3,415.00 Includes: Pacific Whale Foundation Watch - Maalaea Harbor & breakfast daily Note: Airfares are additional. Features 4 or 5 nights accommodation as specified Inclusions & bonuses as specified Note: Package price is per person, double share Resort fees are mandatory and payable direct Airfares are additional Aston at the Whaler Kaanapali Beach + Skyline Haleakala Adventure (4 stars) Set along the pristine Kaanapali Beach shoreline is Aston at The Whaler on Kaanapali Beach, a condominium resort that exudes leisure and relaxation. Comprised of two 12-story towers on six acres of lush tropical landscaping, spend days dipping in the pool, catching sunsets on the beachfront, and unwinding by the fire pits. Other convenient on-site amenities include a sauna, fitness centre, spa, and tennis court. Aston at The Whaler on Kaanapali Beach is just a hop away from Whaler’s Village and a short drive to the town of Lahaina. Skyline Haleakala Adventure - Embark on an exhilarating tour that takes you on a journey to explore the stunning landscapes of Haleakala, Maui’s iconic volcano. Known for its stunning sunrise views, this adventure offers an unforgettable experience as you traverse the summit, with unique highlights and wonders along the way. Rooms Standard Studio (4 nights) 01 Apr - 31 May 26 Stay price: $1,949.00 Includes: Skyline Haleakala Adventure Note: Airfares are additional. Features 4 or 5 nights accommodation as specified Inclusions & bonuses as specified Note: Package price is per person, double share Resort fees are mandatory and payable direct Airfares are additional Terms & Conditions Terms & Conditions: Prices are correct as at 14 October 2025 and are subject to availability & change without notice. Sales period: Valid for sale from 14 October 2025 until 14 November 2025 unless otherwise stated, withdrawn or sold out prior. General conditions: All prices are per person & in NZ Dollars. All prices are based on payment by cash or EFTPOS only. Airfares are additional. Subject to availability. Room rates are dynamic providing the best rate of the day dependent on current inventory as such these are subject to availability & change without notice. Based on travel Thur-Mon and Sat-Wed. Airfares & holiday packages include airline, operational costs, pre-payable taxes & airport charges unless otherwise stated. Additional levies, government charges & other applicable fees may apply & are beyond our control. Minimum & maximum stay restrictions may apply. Selected deals are based on restricted flight schedules, hotel check in/out time & are ultimately the responsibility of the passengers upon booking to ensure flight schedules & hotel check in/out time are suitable for their needs. Seasonal surcharges & blackout dates may apply depending on date of travel. Stopovers & alternative routes may incur additional costs. Prices are valid for new bookings only. Accommodation, holiday packages, cruises & tours are based on twin share, unless otherwise stated. Holidays are based on consecutive night stays. The accommodation, cruises, airfares, coach & small group tours & any other components included are provided by carriers & hoteliers with their own terms & conditions, which your booking is subject to.For full terms & conditions visit www.infinityholidays.co.nz/conditions Experience the world differently.
